name: Ultimate Solitaire
summary: Ultimate Solitaire is a largest collection of Solitaire available with over 250 different games. Test your skills with Klondike (traditional solitaire), Pyramid, Free Cell, Spider and tons of other variations. Forget playing alone - match up against other players, or play against the clock. Choose your own cards, backgrounds, and sound effects. Ultimate Solitaire guarantees you hours of fun and challenge the whole family can enjoy.
